text:
Audience Reviews View More (151)

Calvin O I watched this movie and it was the funniest movie I have watched in 2025 after all is a 2017 movie. In my opinion its just a fun movie filled with good jokes and a surprisingly great chemistry between Dwayne Johnson and Zac Efron. Definitively worth a watch if you are looking too have a laugh. Rated 4/5 Stars • Rated 4 out of 5 stars 09/29/25 Full Review Chuck M Laughed my ass off. Jokes are golden. I was very hesitant to see this and it took over 8 yrs to watch it and I'm glad I did. Anyone who says it's terrible clearly doesn't Like entertainment. Rated 5/5 Stars • Rated 5 out of 5 stars 09/27/25 Full Review Andrei S I know the movie is a bit stupid, but I love it, I enjoy it a lot every time I watch it again. Rated 3.5/5 Stars • Rated 3.5 out of 5 stars 09/11/25 Full Review Russell H Lots of immature humor. Not much else Rated 3.5/5 Stars • Rated 3.5 out of 5 stars 08/26/25 Full Review Raymond C Baywatch is dumb, poorly written and features bad characters. It's not very funny either and at times it looks really cheap. It's watchable thanks to the cast but overall not very good. Rated 2/5 Stars • Rated 2 out of 5 stars 08/14/25 Full Review Stephen C Funny in 1 hour and 56 minutes!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Rated R for Graphic Nudity, Crude Sexual Content and Language Throughout!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! The USA grossed over $58,000,000.00!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Rated 5/5 Stars • Rated 5 out of 5 stars 08/11/25 Full Review Read all reviews
